description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Both STRACO Episode 2 and 3 in one package!  Fight the evil Filth plague and defeat Boss Noss!  2 hour single player campaign -- Mini-games -- P2P high scores -- And other such nonsense!!!!  Be the hero that your mother always wanted you to be!
